alert.note: Alert for Kennebec; Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 4:33PM EST until December 21 at 9:43AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Kennebec and Somerset Counties. Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River at Hallowell affecting Sagadahoc and Kennebec Counties. Carrabassett River At North Anson affecting Franklin and Somerset Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at Skowhegan. * WHEN...Until late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 80,000.0 cfs, East River Road floods to a depth of 1 to 2 feet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 PM EST Monday the flow was 28,493.0 cfs. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 109,330.0 cfs tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood flow is 35,000.0 cfs. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
